meaning: مَجْمُوعَةٌ مِنَ الْأَفْرَادِ الَّذِينَ لَهُم صِلَةٌ قَرَابَةٌ بَعْضُهُم بَعْضًا
translation: A group of individuals related to each other

meaning: الْوَالِدُ الأَبُّ أَوْ الْأُمُّ الَّذِي هُوَ أَبُو الْوَالِدِ
translation: The father of one's parent (father or mother)

meaning: الْوَالِدَةُ الأَبُّ أَوْ الْأُمُّ الَّذِي هِيَ أُمّ الْوَالِدِ
translation: The mother of one's parent (father or mother)
The parent who is the father
The parent who is the mother
The female sibling
The male sibling

meaning: الِابْنُ أَوْ الِابْنَةُ لِلْأَبْنِ أَوْ الْأَبْنَةِ
translation: The son or daughter of one's son or daughter

meaning: الشَّقِيقُ الذَّكَرُ الَّذِي يَكُون مِنْ مَخْلُوقَاتٍ مُتَطَابِقَةِ الشَّكْلِ وَالتَّكْوِينِ
translation: The male sibling who is of identical shape and formation
The male sibling of one's father or mother
The male sibling of one's mother
The female sibling of one's father or mother
The female sibling of one's mother
The man who is married to a woman
The woman who is married to a man
To reside in a specific place

meaning: التَّعْلِمُ وَاكْتِسَابُ المَعْرِفَةِ عَنْ طَرِيقِ الدِّرَاسَةِ
translation: Learning and acquiring knowledge through study

meaning: الْإِعْجَابُ وَالْمَشَاعِرُ الإِيجَابِيَّةُ تَجَاهَ شَخْصٍ أَوْ شَيْءٍ
translation: Positive feelings of admiration and affection towards a person or thing
The male or female child

vocabulary.en: In-laws (Parents of the Husband and Wife):
translation: The parents of the husband and wife

meaning: الشَّخْصُ الَّذِي لَهُ صِلَةٌ قَرَابَةٌ بِالْعَائِلَة
translation: A person related to the family

meaning: كَلِمَةٌ أَوْ لَقَبٌ يُسْتَخْدَمُ لِتَوْجِيهِ الِاحْتِرَامِ أَوْ التَّقْدِيْرِ لِشَخْصٍ مُعَيَّنٍ
translation: A word or title used to show respect or honor to a specific person
A person who is not yet married
An unmarried woman
A person who is married
A person who is engaged
